## Dataset

```{r}
gap5 <- read.csv("data/gapminder-FiveYearData.csv") 
head(gap5)
dim(gap5)
summary(gap5)
str(gap5)
```

## Including Plots

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(gap5, aes(year, lifeExp)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    geom_smooth(position = "identity", se = FALSE, method = "lm", color = "blue", lwd = 2) +
    facet_wrap( ~ continent)
```
